short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically redirect to your affiliate links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never forget to use your favorite content creator's affiliate links with this extension!!!
Always Affiliate allows you to save a list of affiliate links that will automatically load when accessing those sites!

Always Affiliate requires no website permissions by default, and only requests website permissions as you add affiliate links.
